dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey B, you are *not* going to believe what I just read. Like, this is wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey B, you are not going to believe what I just read. Like, this is wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh? Lay it on me, A. Is it another one of those crazy travel promotions?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh? Lay it on me, A. Is it another one of those crazy travel promotions?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, Airbnb. They're doing this thing... they're offering an overnight stay on the Great Wall of China.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, Airbnb. They're doing this thing... they're offering an overnight stay on the Great Wall of China.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The four winners (plus a guest each) will be in residence for a night each during the time period September 4-8th... on the listing page for the Great Wall on Airbnbs site.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? On the Wall? Like, *actually* on it? Uh, how does that even work?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? On the Wall? Like, actually on it? Uh, how does that even work?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! It's clearly a huge promo opportunity for them, you know, to highlight their 125% growth in China. But for the four winners, oh my gosh, the bragging rights are gonna be *unquestioned*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! It's clearly a huge promo opportunity for them, you know, to highlight their one hundred twenty five percent growth in China. But for the four winners, oh my gosh, the bragging rights are gonna be unquestioned.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Its a promotional opportunity for the company, clearly, to spotlight the 125% growth in its number of listings in China in the last year... But for the four who win, the experience will truly be unique and the bragging rights unquestioned.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no kidding. So, like, where do you even sleep? Is it just a sleeping bag on the bricks or something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no kidding. So, like, where do you even sleep? Is it just a sleeping bag on the bricks or something?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope, nope. They're setting up a large bed in one of the towers. And get this: a plexiglass ceiling and windows, so you can see the moon and stars. But they're also bringing quality linens because, um, it gets chilly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope, nope. They're setting up a large bed in one of the towers. And get this: a plexiglass ceiling and windows, so you can see the moon and stars. But they're also bringing quality linens because, um, it gets chilly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The accommodations will be located in one of the towers, a large bed installed with fine quality linens and blanketsnecessary because although plexiglass will cover the ceiling and windows allowing the moon and stars to show through, theres also the possibility of cool night air.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Chilly, right, because it's outdoors! What about... you know, facilities? Like, a bathroom?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Chilly, right, because it's outdoors! What about... you know, facilities? Like, a bathroom?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Good question! Portable bathrooms are being brought in, or you can, like, wander down the Wall to permanent ones. And for dinner, a multi-course Chinese banquet with traditional musicians.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good question! Portable bathrooms are being brought in, or you can, like, wander down the Wall to permanent ones. And for dinner, a multi-course Chinese banquet with traditional musicians.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Portable bathrooms are being brought in (or guests can wander down the Wall to permanent facilities.) The dining table will be set up for a multi course Chinese banquet, each course illustrating a particular aspect of Chinese culture, and accompanied by traditional musicians.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. That's, uh, quite the setup. So, you wake up there... then what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. That's, uh, quite the setup. So, you wake up there... then what?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sunrise! You get to hike through the countryside surrounding the Wall, and official historians are there to detail its 2600 years of history, dynasties, all that jazz.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sunrise! You get to hike through the countryside surrounding the Wall, and official historians are there to detail its two thousand, six hundred years of history, dynasties, all that jazz.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The sunrise functions as a wake up call for guests to hike through the countryside surrounding the 13,170 mile long Wall. Official historians will be alongside to detail the 2600 years of history, the contributions of the various dynasties, intricacies of construction and purpose along with current preservation efforts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's amazing! And, uh, anything else to round out the experience?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's amazing! And, uh, anything else to round out the experience?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, before you leave, you can learn other Chinese cultural stuff, like calligraphy and seal engraving. Pretty cool, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, before you leave, you can learn other Chinese cultural stuff, like calligraphy and seal engraving. Pretty cool, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Guests will also be given the opportunity to learn other aspects of Chinese culture such as calligraphy and seal engraving, activities generally offered on other, more typical, Airbnb stays, before they depart.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That is *so* cool. How do people even enter? Is there, like, a lottery?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That is so cool. How do people even enter? Is there, like, a lottery?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope, you have to write a bit. Explain why it's important to break down barriers between cultures and how you want to build new connections.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope, you have to write a bit. Explain why it's important to break down barriers between cultures and how you want to build new connections.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To enter, participants need to do a bit of writing, explaining why it is more important now than ever to break down barriers between cultures and how they want to build new connections.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ooh, thoughtful! And when's the deadline for this, um, historical sleepover?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ooh, thoughtful! And when's the deadline for this, um, historical sleepover?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: August 11th, 11:59 PM Beijing time. And it's for four winners, plus a guest each.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: August eleventh, eleven:fifty nine P M Beijing time. And it's for four winners, plus a guest each.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They need to enter by 11:59 PM Beijing time on August 11th on the listing page for the Great Wall on Airbnbs site. The four winners (plus a guest each) will be in residence for a night each during the time period September 4-8th...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they just get the one night? What about, like, getting there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they just get the one night? What about, like, getting there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, it's a whole package! Air tickets to Beijing, regular Airbnb accommodation for a few other nights, three meals a day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, it's a whole package! Air tickets to Beijing, regular Airbnb accommodation for a few other nights, three meals a day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...other non-Wall prizes are includedair tickets to Beijing from the nearest international airport (or ground transport if the winner lives within 100 miles of Beijing), a regular Airbnb accommodation between September 3-9 (except for the night on the Wall) and three meals a day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, it's like, a full-on trip, not just a glorified camping trip. That's incredible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, it's like, a full-on trip, not just a glorified camping trip. That's incredible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Definitely a bucket-list experience, courtesy of Airbnb.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Definitely a bucket-list experience, courtesy of Airbnb.
